name: The Ninja's Garden
description:
Grow your garden, your body and your mind. Explore the world, find hidden gems, solve puzzles and navigate deadly traps. Become the ultimate ninja gardener.

This is a game designed to be completed in about half an hour, but is designed to be as much of a speed-runable game as I could make in a week. The whole point of the game is figuring out how to beat the game quickly and efficiently.

It's designed to be a test of both a players platforming skill, puzzle solving skill, routing skill and sequence break finding skills. The game has a few quirks that can be exploited, and any exploits I found I left in. There are also deliberate hidden passages and rooms required for a 100% playthrough

Update 15/01/17 12:00 GMT: Fixed a bug with 100% run, updated time text to H:M:S format.
